summary: The dvc.repo package implements the core functionality of the Data Version Control (DVC) system, offering a comprehensive API for creating, managing, and interacting with DVC repositories. It handles data tracking, pipeline stage definition, cache management, remote synchronization, artifact registration, repository initialization, status reporting, diff generation, garbage collection, and worktree operations, all while integrating tightly with Git and providing safe locking and SCM context handling.
business_intent: To provide data scientists, machine learning engineers, and DevOps teams with a reliable toolset for versioning large datasets, reproducible pipelines, and model artifacts, enabling collaborative development, efficient storage management, and seamless integration with existing Git workflows.
